Html:
Hi,I'm very new to your NAudio,    
how can i do select a soundcard where reproduce mp3/wma/ogg?

Thanks Giuseppe Lippolis.

Hi,

I'm not entirely sure what you mean. Have you looked at some of the example code in NAudioDemo? This shows how to play an MP3. NAudio currently cannot play back WMA or OGG files.

Mark

Hi,

I have two sound card, i would like play a mp3 on each card.

Sorry for bad English
Giuseppe.

Hi,

you use the DeviceNumber property on WaveOut. You will need to create one instance of WaveOut for each MP3 file you want to play.

Mark

Thanks.

Edit:
Any status for the wma-implementation that you mentioned in a previous thread
